Body: I'm looking for a stable ROM for a HTC Desire on Android 4.x. This is for quite an important task, as I am supposed to be testing an application he has written that only works on 4.x+.Is anyone able to help me here? If so many thanks.EDIT: This has been flagged as already answered, I understand there are probably many answers for HTC Desire ROMS with ICS or Jelly Bean, this question is trying to gauge opinion on which one is the most stable. Thanks
Title: Stable Android 4.x ROM for HTC Desire GSM
